title: Galdor, Councilor From the West (3U18)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Ally • Home 3 • Elf
Strength:	5
Vitality:	2
Site:	3
Game Text:	To play, spot an Elf. Regroup: Exert Galdor and spot a minion to return that minion to its owner's hand.
Lore:	”'My heart tells me that Sauron will expect us to take the western way, when he learns what has befallen. He soon will.'”
Rarity:	U
